question.statement: Structured data can be effectively analyzed using spreadsheets.
Unstructured data is difficult to work with and doesn't have any potential use.
Which of the following examples represents unstructured data?

options.option: A spreadsheet with customer names and purchase amounts
A collection of images from a Department of Motor Vehicles.
A catalog listing book titles, authors, and publication dates.

question.statement: How would you define data science based on the provided content?

options.option: Data science is primarily focused on structured data analysis.
Data science involves creating knowledge from data through analysis.
Data science is exclusively related to computer programming.
Data science is the study of multimedia content.

question.statement: Which of the following should you consider when determining if you could be a data scientist?

options.option: Your ability to create multimedia files.
Identifying data related to your interests.
The structured or unstructured nature of the data.
Asking questions about your area of interest.
